subject: OPTOM
title: Clinical Clerkship 2
description: Supervised optometric patient care in one, or more, external clinical settings. This course is complementary to OPTOM 458 Clinical Clerkship 1 and includes optometric assessment, diagnosis and management of refractive errors, disorders and diseases of the eye and visual system, along with associated systemic conditions and practice management. [Offered: S, F, W]
